function.name: isempty

long.para: isempty(x) returns logical true or false depending on whether the argument x is empty.

function.examples:
Non-empty array:
>> x = randm(2)
x =
2x2 Cl(1,1) multivector array
>> isempty(x)
ans =
0
Empty array:
>> x = clifford.empty
x =
[] Cl(1,1) multivector
>> isempty(x)
ans =
1
